latestNews.title: Aurora Underground
latestNews.description: Aurora Underground starts work on Eastern Star Line, set to open sometime this year.

latestNews.title: Jasko Travel
latestNews.description: Jasko Travel opens some exciting new cable car lines - TCC, MS1.

latestNews.title: Aurora Underground
latestNews.description: Eastern Star Line will be formed of four stations: Wildwood Junction, Cranberry Valley, Starlight Junction, and Icefield Park.

latestNews.title: Aurora Underground
latestNews.description: Elizabeth Line has been announced! This line is currently under early development and will start at Starlight Junction. Construction at Starlight Junction is finished.

latestNews.title: Skyline Rail (SR)
latestNews.description: The 晶蓝线 Jinglan Line will start construction soon. The line will be formed of 6 stations: Starlight Junction South (a branch of Starlight Junction to the south), Yunshan, Oceanview, Jin Li Yuan, Lakeside Square, Heritage.

latestNews.title: Aurora Underground
latestNews.description: Eastern Star Line to be opened soon! Construction at Icefield Park is close to being finished.

latestNews.title: Aurora Overground
latestNews.description: Welcome to Aurora Overground, an upcoming branch of the National Railway Company of Aurora (NRCA), looking to bring commuter rail to Country of Aurora!

latestNews.title: Alpine Link (AL)
latestNews.description: Welcome to Alpine Link, a subsidiary of Alpine Railways, looking to bring high speed services to connect Country of Aurora with others!
